Package gw.api.web

Class WebUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.web.WebUtil
public class WebUtil extends Object
Utility class for getting useful web information statically.

jburton

  • Constructor Details

    • WebUtil

      public WebUtil()

  • Method Details

    • getActionEventParameter

      public static String getActionEventParameter()
      Returns the arbitrary "parameter" string that was sent back from the browser as part of the current "action event" (like a button click or menu item selection). This is most commonly used to get the answer when an action widget has a "promptQuestion" defined.
      Returns:
      the action event's parameter, or null if there's no current action event or if that event doesn't have a parameter.

    • getActionEventWidgetId

      public static String getActionEventWidgetId()
      Determines the id of the widget for the currently executing action
      Returns:
      String

    • getResourcesPath

      public static String getResourcesPath()
      Returns:
      the full URL of the web resources. Localization is not supported

    • getLocalizedResourcesPath

      public static String getLocalizedResourcesPath()
      Returns:
      the full URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.

    • getBasePath

      public static String getBasePath()

    • getResourcesDir

      public static String getResourcesDir()
      Returns:
      The relative URL of the web resources. Localization is not supported

    • getLocalizedResourcesDir

      public static String getLocalizedResourcesDir()
      Returns:
      The relative URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.

    • copyFileToClient

      public static void copyFileToClient(String mimeType, File file) throws IOException
      Send file. We disable normal Pebbles rendering and generate our own response headers and content.
      Parameters:
      mimeType - the mime type of the content
      file - the file to send to the user
      Throws:
      IOException

    • copyStreamToClient

      public static void copyStreamToClient(String mimeType, String fileName, InputStream is, int length) throws IOException
      Send "file" to web client with name "fileName" and "mimeType". We disable normal Pebbles rendering and generate our own response headers and content.
      Parameters:
      mimeType - the mime type of the document
      fileName - the name this will be saved as by the user if they want it saved
      is - the input stream
      length - the length or -1 to not bother with that header
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getScopingSource

      public static WebUtil.ScopingSource getScopingSource()
      This method will return where the current thread was created. If this thread was created via an HttpServletRequest in either WebService, GosuServlet, UI, SwaggerRest, the equivalent ScopingSource will be reported.
      Returns:
      the ScopingSource
